original_text: And if the plague be greenish or reddish in the garment, or in the skin, either in the warp, or in the woof, or in any thing of skin; it is a plague of leprosy, and shall be shewed unto the priest:
korean_text: 그 의복에나 가죽에나 그 날에나 씨에나 가죽으로 만든 모든 것에 병색이 푸르거나 붉으면 이는 나병의 색점이라 제사장에게 보일 것이요

sentences.original_text: And if the plague be greenish or reddish
in the garment, or in the skin
either in the warp, or in the woof
or in any thing of skin
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 가죽制成的任何东西中

sentences.original_text: it is a plague of leprosy
and shall be shewed unto the priest
